titles.title: Honoring the 50th anniversary of the Freedom Rides.
Honoring the 50th anniversary of the Freedom Rides.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Mr. Johnson (GA) asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Honors the 50th anniversary of the Freedom Rides and recognizes the leadership and sacrifice of the Freedom Riders in their commitment to ending racial segregation in America.
